name: So Many Tabs
description: Too many tabs? Can't find anything? Replace your new tab page with a grid of tabs, with image previews! Now you can add even more tabs!

action.default_title: Save (Ctrl+m to save the link under the mouse cursor / current page)

save-hover-link.description: Save the link under the mouse cursor. If nothing is under the link, saves the current page. (5)

unsave.description: Unsave the current tab (and go to the next tab) (7)

dismiss-and-goto-next.description: Dismiss the current tab and go to the next saved tab (3)
